org.apache.lucene.util

Class FailureMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener
      • org.apache.lucene.util.FailureMarker

  • public class FailureMarker
extends RunListener
    A RunListener that detects suite/ test failures. We need it because failures due to thread leaks happen outside of any rule contexts.
